Title: FG to replicate Lekki deep seaport model across Nigeria
Summary: Federal Government to replicate success of $1.5 billion Lekki Deep Seaport across Nigeria . Minister of Marine and Blue Economy, Adegboyega Oyetola, has announced the Federal Government’s plans to replicate the success .

Title: Lagos court jails two men 10 years for cannabis trafficking
Summary: Lagos court jails two men 10 years for cannabis trafficking . Ajetsibo Emami and Solomon Akpomuai sentenced to a combined 10 years imprisonment . The Federal High Court sitting in Lagos has convicted and sentenced two men .

Title: 2027: ADC youth wing rallies Nigerians against vote-buying, godfatherism
Summary: Coalition of groups from across the country, under the auspices of the African Democratic Youth Congress (ADYC), has called on well-meaning Nigerians to resist the menace of vote-buying and godfatherism .

Title: NCAA orders airlines to enforce phone switch-off during take-off, landing
Summary: Nigeria Civil Aviation Authority orders airlines to enforce phone switch-off during take-off, landing . NCAA’s Director of Public Affairs and Consumer Protection, disclosed the directive .

Title: Kaduna police arrest 13 cattle rustlers
Summary: Security operatives in Kaduna have arrested 13 suspected cattle rustlers . They recovered 27 cows along the Kaduna–Abuja Expressway .

Title: Nasarawa lawmaker appoints 106 aides
Summary: Musa Gude, member representing Uke/Karshi Constituency in Nasarawa State House of Assembly, says he has appointed 106 aides to assist him in serving his people .

Title: Bye-Election: INEC to present Certificates of Return to winners on Thursday
Summary: INEC to present Certificates of Return to winners of federal legislative seats in last Saturday's bye-elections . INEC has announced that it will present certificates of return to winners on Thursday .

Title: Blue Economy: Nigeria will witness vast economic growth by 2030 – NPA chairman
Summary: Sen. Dayo Adeyeye, Board Chairman, Nigerian Ports Authority, says Nigeria will witness a vast and viable economic growth in the next five years through the Blue Economy . He stated this on Tuesday while speaking as guest lecturer at a public lecture organised by the Centre for Blue Economy and Innovation, Olusegun Agagu University of Ol

Title: FG announces nationwide strategy to address housing deficit
Summary: The Minister of Housing and Urban Development, Ahmed Dangiwa made this known while inaugurating the FHA Express View Estate 1 and FHA Complex in Lugbe, Abuja .

Title: Abiodun seeks Chinese partnership in mineral resources exploration
Summary: Ogun State Governor, Prince Dapo Abiodun, has called for a partnership with Chinese investors to explore the mineral resources that abound in the State . The Governor has also called for the Chinese to be involved in the exploration of the State's mineral resources .
